name: Endless Furry Killer 2020
description:
Endless Furry Killer 2020 is the game that lets you kill furries endlessly!
Shoot furries in a endless 2d top down action packed adventure!
Fun for the whole family!

Key Features:
Eliminate Furries
2d Top Down Game
Endless Combat
Unlockable Upgrades
Ammo, Health, Money Pickups
3 Difficulty Modes
2 Map Variations

Future updates may include:
New Weapons
New Sounds
New Unlockables
New Pickups
New Enemies
New Maps
New Artwork
